title: Haven't received my pulsefire ezreal icon yet
body: I have had the skin for a long time I do have the time portal icon but not the PFE icon yet, I read that the icon should be in my inventory as soon as I log in. is this a bug?

replies.body:
No problem, I dipped into your account and just added it for ya. Make sure you login and check to see it wound up where it should be for me though!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=DatFatRaccoon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=amQA3iLZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-28T01:55:17.565+0000)
>
> No problem, I dipped into your account and just added it for ya. Make sure you login and check to see it wound up where it should be for me though!
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Is this something that will need to be done for anyone that hasn't received the icon yet or are they on the way and it will just take time? I have yet to receive mine either.

Broporo with the assist! {{summoner:31}} 

If someone has the PFE skins already and hasn't gotten the icon, if they shoot us a ticket or post we can get it taken care of! They should be going out automatically, but sometimes a few people can get missed here and there.
Hi! I still haven't received my new Pulsefire icon yet either. Do you think you can help me out too? Thanks a ton in advance :)
hi i havent got my icon yet thanks in advance :)
I don't have it yet either, though I saw another red saying they're still going out automatically?
Thank you very much I have received my icon
